messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. You are connected with Vivian and a new app appears in which you can connect to anyone only once. From Vivian, what is the connection path that yields the most reward? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

1. Start with Vivian (connected to Vivian)
2. Connect to Salma (Salma is connected to Vivian, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue, Noah, and Anisha)
3. Connect to Shanshan (Shanshan is connected to Salma, Vadim, and Noah)
4. Connect to Vadim (Vadim is connected to Salma, Shanshan, and Noah)
5. Connect to Gongxue (Gongxue is connected to Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Alice, and Anisha)
6. Connect to Paul (Paul is connected to Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice)
7. Connect to Solomon (Solomon is connected to Paul, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice)
8. Connect to Soheil (Soheil is connected to Paul, Solomon, Gongxue, Alice, Pierre, Abdul, Durga, and Ajit)
9. Connect to Alice (Alice is connected to Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Abdul)
10. Connect to Pierre (Pierre is connected to Abdul, Durga, and Ajit)
11. Connect to Abdul (Abdul is connected to Pierre, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha)
12. Connect to Durga (Durga is connected to Pierre, Abdul, Ajit, and Anisha)
13. Connect to Ajit (Ajit is connected to Pierre, Abdul, Durga, and Anisha)
14. Connect to Anisha (Anisha is connected to Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue)
15. Connect to Noah (Noah is connected to Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha)

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue, Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Alice, Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha, Noah

teleShortcut.parsed_response: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue, Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Alice, Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha, Noah
